Body:
slits = SlitTraceSet(np.full((1000, 1), 2, dtype=float), np.full((1000, 1),
    8, dtype=float), 'MultiSlit', nspat=10, PYP_SPEC='dummy')
tst_file = data_path('tst_slittrace.fits')
if os.path.isfile(tst_file):
    os.remove(tst_file)
slits.to_file(tst_file)
_slits = SlitTraceSet.from_file(tst_file)
assert np.array_equal(_slits.left_init, np.full((1000, 1), 2, dtype=float)
    ), 'Bad left read'
assert np.array_equal(_slits.left_init, slits.left_init), 'Bad left read'
if os.path.isfile(tst_file):
    os.remove(tst_file)
slits.to_file(tst_file)
slits.to_file(tst_file, overwrite=True)
_slits = SlitTraceSet.from_file(tst_file)
assert np.array_equal(slits.right_init, _slits.right_init
    ), 'Bad read from_file'
os.remove(tst_file)
